bill.title: Sunshine Law; Permitted Interactions; Notice
bill.description: Allows board and commission members to hear testimony for a meeting canceled for lack of quorum and to attend informational meetings. Effective July 1, 2012. (SB2859 HD2)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-02-12 9:30AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 02-07-12 10:15AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 02-09-12 9:30AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2458) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 343) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 41
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 03-16-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Carroll, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 5 Excused: Representative(s) Coffman, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1151-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Cabanilla, Herkes, C. Lee, Luke, Marumoto, Saiki, Thielen excused (7).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 03-29-12 5:30PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1589-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-10-12.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 518).
(S) Senate disagrees with House amendments.
(H) Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 679).
(H) House conferees appointed: Keith-Agaran, Har Co-Chairs; Tokioka, Thielen.
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Hee, Chair; Shimabukuro, Co-Chair(s); Ihara, Slom.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 752).
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 611).
(S) Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-20-12 2:35PM in conference room 325.
(S) Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-24-12 2:30PM in conference room 325.
(S) Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-26-12 2:30PM in conference room 325.

(S) The Senate Conference Managers recommend that the Senate agree to the House amendments. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
(S) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-12-12 in disagreeing to the House amendments.
(S) Senate agrees with House amendments. Placed on the calendar for Final Reading on 05-01-12.
(S) One Day Notice 05-01-12.
(S) Passed Final Reading. 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
(H) Received notice of reconsideration, Senate agreement, and Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 832).
(S) Enrolled to Governor.
